short_description: HEALTH BENEFIT: The Myga Yoga Wheel helps you to move deeper into your yoga poses and helps cushion your muscles, feet and back to improve spinal stiffness.
YOGA PROP: The Yoga Wheel is an excellent prop for yoga and pilates workouts, improving flexibility and releases muscle tension. Helps move you into deeper postures.
Soft cork exterior with an eye catching Mandala print and a wood-effect interior design. Created using sustainable sources being environmental.
Lightweight: The Myga Cork Wheel is lightweight and portable with a sturdy inner core and comfortable thick cork exterior. Ideal for use in the home, studio or gym.

product_description: Myga Yoga Wheel for Yoga Poses and Backbends Inversions and Bridge Positions - Dharma Yoga Prop Wheel for Stretching, Support, Flexibility and Tension Release - Yoga Circle Roller for Pilates Myga offer a collection of products including yoga equipment and travel items that integrate elemental features that included style, quality, durability, good grip, comfort, support and eco-friendly aspects at an affordable price. At Myga, we are acutely aware, that manufacturing and distribution has an impact on the environment and that we should act to reduce this impact, by conducting our business in a responsible, considerate and thoughtful manner. We are currently recycling cardboard and using this for packaging. We are also working towards eliminating non-recyclable plastics, from our packaging completely. Myga are developing products that replace the need for single use plastics. Release tension and stretch by taking your practice to the next level with this must have prop in your modern yoga practice. Designed to release muscular tightness in the back, chest, shoulders, abdomen and hip flexors. The yoga wheel assists you in backbends and inversions and it will also massage the entire length of your spine in a safe but deep way. The wheel helps you to move deeper into postures, specifically heart opening postures like backbends and forearm balances. The yoga wheel also challenges you in your balance poses as well as encourages a wide range of benefits, including the relief of minor backache, spinal alignment and deep muscle tension. Use and Care: Your yoga wheel is easy to clean. Use a rag or towel and wipe the surface as well as the inner circle to remove spots with gentle soap or mild laundry detergent diluted in water. Rinse the water and pipe completely dry with a towel or cloth. Add the Myga Yoga Wheel to your basket today!

name: ProsourceFit Yoga Wheel Prop 12” for Improving Yoga Poses, Backbends, Flexibility, Balance, Stretching, Relaxation
short_description: STRETCH & RELEASE – Wheel design helps open up back, chest and hips to release tight muscles and improve flexibility
ENHANCED YOGA PERFORMANCE – Helps perform challenging backbend & balance moves. Take your practice to the next level!

IDEAL SIZE – 12” diameter by 5” width is the perfect size for back support, stability in balance poses and easy carrying
LIFETIME WARRANTY – We believe in the high quality of our wheel, so we offer a limited lifetime warranty guarantee
product_description: Whether you’re a fitness beginner, advanced yoga practitioner, or just want to mix up your workout and stretching routines, the ProsourceFit Yoga Wheel will take your per-formance to the next level. It offers a fun way to challenge your balance, stretch, and safely learn new yoga poses. Ideal for opening up and stretching your back and chest muscles and hips. The 12-inch diameter and 5-inch width provide the ideal size to sup-port you as you stretch out backwards across the wheel. The deep stretch without strain will help loosen up muscles and provide relief for a tight upper body. The sturdy ABS interior design supports up to 500 pounds and is built to last. Use it to learn or improve your yoga wheel pose, plow pose, forearm stands, and more. Deepen stretches or practice balance exercises by placing one leg on the wheel in a variety of poses or core strengthening moves. The exterior provides 1/4” thick TPE cushioning for the most comfortable practice. At just ¾” thick total, the yoga wheel is lightweight and easy to carry so you can take it an-ywhere. To ensure your satisfaction, we offer a limited lifetime warranty to manufacturer defects so you can feel confident about your purchase.
product_details: Product Care Instructions ‎When using your ProsourceFit Yoga Wheel, place on a yoga mat, carpet, or a smooth floor. Do not use on rough surfaces or around to protect the yoga mat-like exterior. Store in a cool, dry place when not in use.

name: Chirp Wheel Foam Roller - Targeted Back & Neck Pain Relief, Muscle Massage, Trigger Point Therapy, High-Density Foam Tool for Physical Therapy, Stretching & Exercise, 500lbs Capacity, 6 Inch Mint
short_description: FUNCTIONAL DESIGN WITH DEEP TISSUE RELIEF WITHOUT PRESSURE: Discover the effective muscle relief of the Chirp Wheel Foam Roller. Engineered for deep tissue massage, this foam roller helps reduce back pain and muscle tension. Unlike traditional foam rollers, its unique design features a spinal canal that protects your spine while applying targeted pressure to the surrounding muscles. With the Chirp Wheel, you’ll experience faster recovery and improved mobility—all without the risk of injury.

BUILT-TO-LAST QUALITY: Experience lasting comfort and support with the Chirp Wheel Foam Roller, built for reliable performance. Whether stretching your back, easing neck tension, or loosening tight leg muscles, it delivers a smooth, supportive feel. Featuring sweat-resistant ½" foam padding, a soft EVA compression-sensitive surface, and a strong PVC-free ABS core that supports up to 500 lbs—for safe, confident use every time.

TARGETS KEY PRESSURE POINTS: The Chirp Wheel Foam Roller targeted exactly where you need it. Designed with dense foam padding, it delivers a firm yet comfortable roll—ideal for easing back pain, loosening tight muscles, and speeding up post-workout recovery. Its unique shape fits naturally between your shoulder blades, while the patent-pending spinal canal protects your spine and gently massages surrounding muscles for deep, effective relief without discomfort.

EXPERIENCE DEEP STRETCHES: Unlock deeper, more effective stretches with the Chirp wheel foam roller, designed for fitness, recovery, and deep tissue massage. Each wheel size delivers a different level of pressure, allowing you to target specific areas of the back, neck, and legs with precision. Built to support your body without flexing or bending, it helps you achieve deeper stretches and muscle release that traditional rollers can’t reach.

EASY TO USE: Customize your relief with ease—smaller wheels provide deeper, targeted pressure, while larger wheels offer a gentle stretch and enhanced chest-opening benefits. Just sit down, position the wheel against your back, and lean to enjoy a soothing, at-home massage. Use it on the floor or in a chair for maximum comfort. In just 5 minutes a day, you can roll away tension and feel the difference.
